issue.title: X2 robot gets stuck on lip between urban service room and urban_straight_door_right

content.raw:
Is the little step intended in Urban Circuit Practice 01, right after the corridor going down and just before the open room? X2 seems to have problems going up that little step, sometimes flips over when coming back. 

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1181422980-lip_Urban_circuit_practice_01.png)
‌
content.html:
Is the little step intended in Urban Circuit Practice 01, right after the corridor going down and just before the open room? X2 seems to have problems going up that little step, sometimes flips over when coming back.

‌
